name: 初始-00伊利亚
text: The royal family of Iria believes that the Waverun City tragedy was a deliberate plot by foreign forces to divide Iria. They are determined not to respond to any demands made by the Waverun Legion and vow to put down the rebellion and restore peace to Iria.

name: 初始-00骑士团
text:
The Union sent the Advance Order to help the Waverun Legion fight in Waverun City.
The Union believes that the royal family of the Kingdom of Iria is responsible for the Waverun City tragedy and should be overthrown.

name: 初始-00教皇国
text: Those powerful nations that once conquered Iria have been pretending to distance themselves from the conflict.

name: 初始-00黑暗之光
text: During the civil war, an evil organization entrenched in the Mine Pit began a campaign to delude the public. It claimed that only destruction could give birth to new life. The organization expanded by continuously preying on the common people. Nobody was truly safe from the Darklight.

name: 初始-00薇尔德
text: The forces located in the northeastern mountains took a dispassionate stance towards the civil war in Iria.

name: 共通线-01伊利亚
text: Dantalion, the ruler of Iria, gave a rousing funeral speech to his soldiers. The grieving King's Army was so inspired by this, that they succeeded in fighting off the Order for the first time.

name: 共通线-01黑暗之光
text: While all the other factions were busy with the civil war of Iria, the Darklight occupied the depths of the Mine Pit. As it grew in size and strength, the Darklight turned to outward aggression and expansion.

name: 共通线-02伊利亚
text: To prevent spies from mixing in with the refugees, the King's Army blocked the bridge over the Iria River, preventing the refugees from traveling from Waverun City to Mornrays Castle. Many of the refugees were stranded on the south bank of the river. They had nowhere to go.

name: 共通线-02骑士团
text: Condemning the King's Army's blockade of the bridge and their disregard for the refugees, the Union began establishing camps and preparing an attack on Crossroads Keep.

name: 骑士团线-01伊利亚
text: As its supplies were cut off, the King's Army had to stop quelling the rebellion and retreat to a location to the east of Crossroads Keep. This was a strategic position that was easy to defend, but difficult to attack.

name: 骑士团线-01教皇国
text: After taking full control of the southern region, the Papal States of Rodinia began to march on the Crossroads Keep from the south, preparing to join forces with its ally, the Order.

name: 骑士团线-01黑暗之光
text:
During the civil war, the evil organization entrenched in the Mine Pit began a campaign to delude the public. It claimed that only destruction could give birth to new life. The organization expanded by continuously preying on the common people. Nobody was truly safe from the Darklight.
When the King's Army experienced a power vacuum while quelling the rebellion, the Darklight expanded wildly.
With the conflict between the various factions intensifying, there was no time to notice anything amiss. The Darklight took this opportunity to seize the Mine Pit. They used it as a base of operations and lured desperate refugees into joining them.
The expansion of the Darklight was temporarily halted by the efforts of the royal family of Iria, mercenaries, and militia, but it will likely make a return in the future.

name: 骑士团线-02伊利亚
text: You have fought against the Order and the Waverun Legion many times outside the Keep, and now a great battle looms.

name: 骑士团线-02骑士团
text: After setting up a camp and sending the Waverun Legion outside the city, the Order began to lay siege to Crossroads Keep.

name: 骑士团线-03伊利亚
text: The morale of the King's Army was high after the successful defense of Crossroads Keep. As long as they held the Keep, they would always have the upper hand.

name: 骑士团线-03骑士团
text: Because the Papal States of Rodinia did not come to their aid as promised, the Order stopped attacking and retreated, leaving the Waverun Legion and the mercenaries to fend for themselves.

name: 骑士团线-02教皇国
text: Due to conflicting political interests, the Papal States did not come to the Order's aid as previously agreed. So, the Order had no choice but to abandon the siege.

name: 骑士团线-04伊利亚
text: The Papal States of Rodinia declared that it had allied with the King's Army. Both factions continued sending troops to attack the Order and disrupt the Union's next battle plan.

name: 骑士团线-04骑士团
text: The Order, who failed to take Crossroads Keep, regrouped and prepared for a second offensive on the Keep. After the betrayal by the Papal States of Rodinia, the Order had to be on high alert to defend against frequent attacks from both the King's Army and the Papal States of Rodinia.

name: 骑士团线-03教皇国
text: Unwilling to see the Union advance any further and take control of Iria, the Papal States of Rodinia decided to ally with the King's Army. While sending out troops to disrupt the Order's ambitions, the Papal States was also secretly brewing a plan.

name: 骑士团线-05骑士团
text: Some people in the Union reopened the investigation into the Waverun City tragedy.

name: 骑士团线-04教皇国
text: As the Crossroads Battle II started, the Papal States of Rodinia began to ferociously impede the Union's supply lines, even hiring bandits to achieve their ends.

name: 骑士团线-05伊利亚
text: Facing the Union's second assault, the King's Army, with freshly boosted morale, was prepared to hold Crossroads Keep with all its might and make the Union spill its last drop of blood in the attempt.

name: 骑士团线-06骑士团
text: The regrouped Advance Order launched another attack on Crossroads Keep. They recaptured the territory surrounding the Keep and prepared for a final siege, the last push to finish the job.

name: 骑士团线-06伊利亚
text: The Crossroads Battle ended with the defeat and total rout of the King's Army. After such a heavy loss, the morale of the King's Army was so low that it was difficult to quickly organize an effective counterattack.

name: 骑士团线-07骑士团
text: The Union captured the Keep and took control of the Iria Bridge. From this point, it began a series of strategic counterattacks to push for victory in the war.

name: 骑士团线-07伊利亚
text: With the fall of Crossroads Keep, the King's Army was unable to maintain its defensive posture. Although they had rallied their remaining troops in Mornrays Castle, their strength had been thoroughly depleted.

name: 骑士团线-08骑士团
text: With the fortress of the King's Army successfully captured, the Union's final goal was to take Mornrays Castle and bring an end to the civil war of Iria.

name: 骑士团线-08伊利亚
text: Mornrays Castle was captured. Dantalion, the Leader of the King's Army, was seized, and the hawks were completely overwhelmed by the doves. The royal family of Iria would now agree to surrender with a binding ceasefire agreement.

name: 骑士团线-09骑士团
text: With an army led by Lutfi, the Union launched a general offensive on Mornrays Castle. In the end, Prince Dantalion was arrested, and the civil war of Iria came to an end. The Union, having already gained enough leverage to dethrone the royal family of Iria, would agree to an armistice with the King's Army and then accept its unconditional surrender.

name: 骑士团线-06教皇国
text:
Despite their best efforts, the Papal States of Rodinia failed to prevent the Union from achieving their final victory.
They would withdraw from the war with dignity after signing a peace agreement with the newly coronated royal family, supported by the Order.

name: 骑士团线-09伊利亚
text: Mornrays Castle was captured. Dantalion, the Leader of the King's Army, was seized, and the hawks were completely overwhelmed by the doves. The royal family had no option but to surrender unconditionally to the Union.

name: 骑士团线-10骑士团
text:
After settling down and gathering the Waverun Legion outside the city, the Order began to lay siege to Crossroads Keep.
Because the Papal States of Rodinia did not come to their aid as promised, the Order stopped attacking and retreated, leaving the Waverun Legion and the mercenaries to fend for themselves.
The Order, who failed to take Crossroads Keep, regrouped and prepared for a second offensive on the Keep. After the betrayal by the Papal States of Rodinia, the Order had to be on high alert to defend against frequent attacks from both the King's Army and the Papal States of Rodinia.
Some people in the Order reopened the investigation into the Waverun City tragedy.
The regrouped Advance Order launched another attack on Crossroads Keep. They recaptured the territory surrounding the Keep and prepared for a final siege, the last push to finish the job.
The Order captured the Keep and took control of the Iria Bridge. From this point, it began a series of strategic counterattacks to push for victory in the war.
With the fortress of the King's Army successfully captured, the Order's final goal was to take Mornrays Castle and bring an end to the civil war of Iria.
The Order was able to capture Mornrays Castle and the civil war of Iria indeed came to an end. The Union, having already gained enough leverage to dethrone the royal family of Iria, would agree to an armistice with the King's Army and then accept its unconditional surrender.

name: 王国军线-01黑暗之光
text:
During the civil war, an evil organization entrenched in the Mine Pit began a campaign to delude the public. It claimed that only destruction could give birth to new life. The organization expanded by continuously preying on the common people. Nobody was truly safe from the Darklight. 
While all forces were busy with the civil war of Iria, the Darklight occupied the Mine Pit, and as it grew in size, they turned to outward aggression and expansion. 
After the outbreak of the civil war, many refugees, who had nowhere to go, defected to the Darklight. Sensing the opportunity, the Darklight began a fierce offensive on Iria's hinterlands. In order to contain them, Iria sent the Hanged Men to crush them. They successfully resisted the offensive of the Darklight.

name: 王国军线-02黑暗之光
text: After defeating the Order, Dantalion took the initiative to contact the Papal States, and then they jointly destroyed the lair of the Darklight, wiping it from existence. The remaining forces of the Darklight fled to the Mine Pit in a last-ditch attempt.

name: 王国军线-01伊利亚
text: After taking over the Mine Pit, the Darklight expanded to the west. In order to contain them, Iria sent the Hanged Men to crush them. They successfully resisted the offensive of the Darklight.

name: 王国军线-02伊利亚
text: Lutfi invited Dantalion to negotiate. Dantalion saw through the Union's trap, and the meeting ended in a verbal conflict between them.

name: 王国军线-03伊利亚
text: Iria and Vlder formed an alliance. Vlder sent its main reinforcements to Iria, while the Silverwolf alone helped Iria as Luccia's only back up.

name: 王国军线-04伊利亚
text: The King's Army and the Order fought fiercely at Crossroads Keep. The King's Army was split in several ways to defend the various passes of the Keep. With the full cooperation of the King's Army, the Hanged Men, Vlder, and Luccia, the Order was defeated and had to retreat back to Waverun City to wait for reinforcements.

name: 王国军线-05伊利亚
text: After defeating the Order, the Papal States took the initiative to contact Dantalion, and then they jointly destroyed the lair of the Darklight, wiping it from existence.

name: 王国军线-06伊利亚
text: Dantalion, who survived the rebellion of the old aristocracies started by his own informer, subsequently wiped them out.

name: 王国军线-07伊利亚
text: After receiving reinforcements from their homeland, the Order clashed fiercely with the King's Army at Crossroads Keep. To overcome the Order's advantage, Dantalion instructed Luccian and Vlderians to hold their position while deploying the Convallaria mercenaries for a surprise assault on the Order's logistics hub. Despite significant sacrifices, Dantalion emerged victorious in the second battle of Crossroads Keep. The heavily battered Order was compelled to entertain a peace proposal.

name: 王国军线-08伊利亚
text: In exchange for successful peace talks, the Order surrendered Prince Lutfi, who later died in the duel with Dantalion. Dantalion eventually made the surrender of Auguste of the Order a condition for ceasefire.

name: 王国军线-09伊利亚(骑士团被灭A）
text: Taking advantage of the Order's infighting, the Sword of Convallaria helped Gloria defeat Auguste and expel the remaining forces of the Order from Iria. Auguste was finally brought to trial in Iria.

name: 王国军线-09伊利亚(骑士团被灭B）
text: Following Dantalion's orders, the Sword of Convallaria wiped out all the remaining forces of the Order.

name: 王国军线-10伊利亚(骑士团被灭A）
text: Dantalion sent troops to take over the Mine Pit, but was met with armed resistance from its residents.

name: 王国军线-11伊利亚(骑士团被灭A）
text: The Mine Pit's revolt inspired all the resistance forces scattered across Iria, and a full-scale civil war began.

name: 王国军线-01骑士团
text:
The Union sent the Advance Order to station in Waverun City as a support for the Waverun Legion in their battle.
The Union believes that the royal family of the Kingdom of Iria is responsible for the Waverun City tragedy and should be overthrown.
Dantalion, the ruler of Iria, gave such a rousing state funeral speech to his soldiers that the grieving King's Army succeeded in stopping the Order's attack for the first time.
Condemning the King's Army's blockade of the bridge and disregard for the refugees, the Union began setting up camps and preparing to attack Crossroads Keep.
The Union adopted the proposal of Prince Lutfi of Iria, and invited Dantalion to negotiate under false pretenses. Dantalion saw through the Union's trap, and the meeting ended in a verbal conflict between them.

name: 王国军线-02骑士团
text: The King's Army and the Order fought fiercely at Crossroads Keep. The King's Army was split in several ways to defend the various passes of the Keep. With the full cooperation of the King's Army, the Hanged Men, the Vlder, and Luccia, the Order was defeated. Leaving Gloria and Teadon behind, the remaining troops of the Order had to retreat back to Waverun City for recovery.

name: 王国军线-04骑士团
text: In exchange for successful peace talks, the Order surrendered Prince Lutfi, who later died in the duel with Dantalion. Dantalion said that he would only consider the peace talks if the Order handed over Auguste, the culprit of the Waverun City tragedy.

name: 王国军线-01教皇国
text:
The Papal States of Rodinia, with Twilight City as its center, organized its parishioners to form the Restoration Army against the royal family of Iria.
While the Order were fighting with the King's Army at Crossroads Keep, the troops of the Papal States suddenly appeared to fill the gap in the defense of Iria.

name: 王国军线-02教皇国
text: During the battle between the Order and the King's army, the Papal States took the initiative to contact Dantalion, and then they jointly destroyed the lair of the Darklight, effectively removing it from existence. The Papal States were thus viewed favorably in the hearts of Irians after the war.

name: 王国军线-03教皇国
text: A noblemen's rebellion broke out in Iria, and after Dantalion suppressed it by force, he openly accused the Papal States of being behind the old noblemen, which the Papal States strongly denied.

name: 王国军线-01薇尔德
text: The Sword of Convallaria fulfilled its promise to help Vlder expel the Elamanians. After that, Dantalion also formally reached an agreement with Vlder Tribes that both sides would form a wartime alliance against the Order.

name: 王国军线-02薇尔德
text: The King's Army and the Order fought fiercely at Crossroads Keep. The King's Army was split in several ways to defend the various passes of the Keep. Among them, Vlderians severely defeat the Order by means of mountain guerrilla tactics.

name: 王国军线-03薇尔德
text: \At Crossroads Battle II, the main force of Vlder was wiped out while defending against the surprise attack of the Order. At the same time, the Elaman captured surviving Vlderians, making an end to Vlder.

name: 法皇国线-01法皇国
text: In order to protect the followers and also to contain the Darklight, the Papal States dispatched Samantha to sign a long-term contract with the Sword of Convallaria to jointly combat the Darklight.

name: 法皇国线-02法皇国
text: The rampant Darklight was completely wiped out under the joint attack of the resistant soldiers and the army of the Papal States, and the Papal States quickly seized the Mine Pit in the process.

name: 法皇国线-03法皇国
text: In the siege of Crossroad Keep by the Union, the Papal States sent troops to support the Union on the surface, but in reality, they used various means to delay the Order's attack.

name: 法皇国线-04法皇国
text: After the assassination of Dantalion and Lutfi, the Papal States quickly issued a condemnation accusing the Union of plotting the murder and established an anti-Union alliance with Iria.

name: 法皇国线-06法皇国
text: The peace talks between the Papal States and Iria ultimately ended in failure. The Irian who harbored hatred towards the Papal States showed unprecedented unity in resisting the Papal States, and the Papal States, which had the advantage in numbers, was forced to retreat to Waverun City by the unwavering King's Army.

name: 法皇国线-07法皇国-表线
text: Faced with the successive uprisings, the Papal States had to devote all its efforts to suppressing the rebellious civilians. However, the resistance of the civilians was like a spring, that is, the greater the force applied to suppress it, the more intense the reaction.

name: 法皇国线-08法皇国-表线
text: The Papal States took advantage of the peace talks and sent the Judge to assassinate Faris, but the attempt to assassinate Inanna failed. The Papal States could not defeat Iria on the battlefield, so they chose to secretly destroy Iria's economic pillar by blowing up their mines.

name: 法皇国线-07法皇国-里线
text: Faced with the successive uprisings, the Papal States had to devote all its efforts to suppressing the rebellious civilians. However, the resistance of the civilians was like a spring, that is, the greater the force applied to suppress it, the more intense the reaction.

name: 法皇国线-08法皇国-里线
text: The Papal States accepted Iria's request for peace talks, but what originally had been Faris's abdication ceremony turned into something more—the coronation for Inanna, conducted by Taair in accordance with the will of the people. The Papal States's long-planned mine bombing operation was also successfully stopped by the Sword of Convallaria and Iria's reinforcements. The Papal States only had one barrier left in Iria, the former capital of the State of Iria—Lightgloam City.

name: 法皇国线-01黑暗之光
text: The resistant soldiers gained the support of many civilians, and countless people chose to take up arms against the Darklight. The momentum of the resistant soldiers was like a flame piercing through the darkness.

name: 法皇国线-02黑暗之光
text: The main force of Darklight was annihilated by the resistant soldiers and the Papal States, and the whereabouts of the High Priest Tranquillo were unknown. The cult leader Fernando was eventually captured by the Papal States. Since then, Darklight has been destroyed.

name: 法皇国线-03骑士同盟
text: In order to completely capture the Keep, the Order requested the Papal States's participation in the siege. However, the Papal States only sent reinforcements perfunctorily, and eventually, the Union's attack gradually weakened until they lost the advantage in the battle.

name: 法皇国线-04骑士同盟
text: The Papal States was the first to condemn the Union for plotting the assassination of Dantalion. Although the Union refused to admit it, the anti-Union alliance of Iria and the Papal States was already approaching the Union's stronghold.

name: 法皇国线-05骑士同盟
text: Under the joint attack of the King's Army and the well-trained Papal States's army, the Union was decisively defeated in battle.

name: 法皇国线-03伊利亚
text: The battle for Crossroad Keep escalated, and after a long period of fighting, the King's Army finally turned the tide with their superior defense.

name: 法皇国线-04伊利亚
text: The King's Army won the victory at Crossroad Keep, but Iria's ruler, Dantalion, and the Union's representative, Lutfi, were both assassinated during the peace talks. Thus, Iria and the Papal States together established an anti-Union alliance.

name: 法皇国线-06伊利亚
text: The Papal States initiated peace talks with Iria, but Princess Inanna decisively rejected the Papal States's unreasonable conditions. The Papal States's army launched an assault on the King's Army, igniting the spark of war.

name: 法皇国线-08伊利亚-表线
text: The Papal States pretended to hold peace talks but sent the Judge to assassinate King Faris. These actions inflamed Iria's hatred towards the Papal States even further.

name: 法皇国线-08伊利亚-里线
text: Under Samantha's mediation, Inanna decided to negotiate with the Papal States for peace. At Faris's abdication ceremony, Prince Taair and the public coronated Inanna as the queen of Iria.
